dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, hey, here’s a thought, right? Should pregnant women even be allowed on trains? I mean, isn’t that just, um, way too risky?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, hey, here's a thought, right? Should pregnant women even be allowed on trains? I mean, isn't that just, um, way too risky?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that’s, uh, a good one to start with, A. You’d think there’d be, like, tons of rules for that, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's, uh, a good one to start with, A. You'd think there'd be, like, tons of rules for that, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I totally just assumed it’s, uh, off-limits past a certain point. Common sense, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I totally just assumed it's, uh, off-limits past a certain point. Common sense, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, surprisingly, when we checked with Kazakhstan Temir Zholy, their actual passenger rules? They don't have, like, any special requirements for pregnant travelers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, surprisingly, when we checked with Kazakhstan Temir Zholy, their actual passenger rules? They don't have, like, any special requirements for pregnant travelers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As reported by the company, the rules for the transportation of passengers, baggage, over-the-counter baggage, and mail by rail do not provide for special requirements for the travel of pregnant women.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, seriously? So, they can just, um, hop on? No matter how far along they are?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, seriously? So, they can just, um, hop on? No matter how far along they are?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Officially, yes. But, uh, they do strongly recommend special attention to the mother and baby’s health.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Officially, yes. But, uh, they do strongly recommend special attention to the mother and baby's health.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, this period requires special attention to the health of the expectant mother and baby.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Special attention, like what, though? Just, uh, be extra careful?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Special attention, like what, though? Just, uh, be extra careful?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: More like, consult your doctor before buying a ticket. To assess, you know, any possible risks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: More like, consult your doctor before buying a ticket. To assess, you know, any possible risks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Before purchasing a ticket, it is recommended to consult with your doctor to assess the possible risks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, that makes sense. So, uh, no doctor's note needed by the train company, but it's smart to get one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, that makes sense. So, uh, no doctor's note needed by the train company, but it's smart to get one.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And they do advise refusing travel in the late stages. Just to avoid potential complications, obviously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And they do advise refusing travel in the late stages. Just to avoid potential complications, obviously.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the late stages of pregnancy, it is better to refuse travel to avoid potential complications.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, late stages, that’s, uh, probably when things could really go south.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, late stages, that's, uh, probably when things could really go south.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And if they do travel, it’s, um, recommended they go with loved ones.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And if they do travel, it's, um, recommended they go with loved ones.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During pregnancy, it is recommended to travel accompanied by loved ones.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Are the conductors even, like, trained for emergencies, though? Like, if someone goes into labor?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Are the conductors even, like, trained for emergencies, though? Like, if someone goes into labor?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They are, actually. Conductors receive first aid training.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They are, actually. Conductors receive first aid training.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Conductors are trained in providing first aid, but traveling during pregnancy requires special care and preparation,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Huh. Still, it feels, like, a bit… dicey, even with that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh. Still, it feels, like, a bit... dicey, even with that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really does. So, they stress considering your own health, the trip length, and, um, emergency medical care availability.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really does. So, they stress considering your own health, the trip length, and, um, emergency medical care availability.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thus, although there are no strict restrictions on train travel during pregnancy, it is important to consider your health, the length of the trip, and the possibility of emergency medical care.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, basically, despite the lax rules, you gotta, like, think through everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, basically, despite the lax rules, you gotta, like, think through everything.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely. And just to really drive it home, get this: from 2021 to 2024, fourteen babies were born on K.T.Z. trains.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely. And just to really drive it home, get this: from twenty twenty one to twenty twenty four, fourteen babies were born on K.T.Z. trains.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By the way, according to Kazakhstan Temir Zholy, from 2021 to 2024, 14 babies were born on trains.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, really? Fourteen babies? That’s, uh, completely wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, really? Fourteen babies? That's, uh, completely wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wild indeed. It happens, A.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild indeed. It happens, A.
